attributes.action: have Jill Barham's petition to reject the plans for the mega mosque removed from the e-petitions site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to have Jill Barham's petition to reject the plans for the mega mosque removed from the e-petitions site as she does not validate her views as to why she considers that it will lead to violence and suffering and there is an implicit threat therein. We also believe her petition was born out of ignorance and intolerance and does not represent the British people.

rejection.details: Sorry we don't accept petitions about petitions.  You are free to make your feelings about the "mega-mosque" petition known at our feedback email address.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
